definition: Bianjing, Northern Song capital, now called Kaifeng 開封|开封[Kai1 feng1], Henan
name of a river in Henan/Henan
abbr. for Beijing/surname Jing/Jing ethnic minority
capital city of a country/big/algebraic term for a large number (old)/artificial mound (old)

sentences.english: The Northern Song official kiln was located in Bianliang.
sentences.chinese: 北宋官窑客观存在，地点在汴京。

sentences.english: Not from get she deeply think, might it not be Bian city there what matter?
sentences.chinese: 不由得她深想，莫非汴京那边出了什么事？

sentences.english: Go along Bianjing Road and turn right at the fifth crossing.
sentences.chinese: 沿着汴京路走，在第五个十字路口向右转。
